name: Counterclockwise Neck Circles
how_to_perform:
# Start by sitting or standing with your head in a neutral position, looking forward.

# Slowly turn your head to the right, keeping it level as you make small circles with your chin.

# Keep your face relaxed and continue making larger or smaller circles as desired. Don't lift your chin upwards or lower it downwards during this exercise. Repeat for 10-15 repetitions.

# Gradually decrease the size of the circles as you finish each set.

# Switch directions by moving your head counterclockwise for a similar number of repetitions, starting from right side to left.
short_summary: Perform small to large counterclockwise circles with your chin to stretch and relax the neck muscles.
